creditline: Gift of The Frederick and Margaret L. Weyerhaeuser Foundation
description: small covered tureen; shell and ecanthus feet at each corner, large crest at each side of tureen; twisted rope rim; reed and lead handles; double handled
markings: COVER MARKINGS: \'ST JE PIUS\' in crest over deer head a top an armour helmet with clouds or waves in background at each side of cover, \'L7288(Circled)\' hand etched under cover with [lion], \'P\', and script \'LR\' at side below rim; TUREEN MARKINGS: \'L572(circled)\'/\'L7288(circled)\'/\'150 each\'/\'1 pair\', [lion]/[crowned head] script \'LR\', \'P\'/[bust] facing right at underside
title: Covered Tureen, one of a pair
